text: Create a multi-line output that fits on a single line without any line breaks.
Write code comments that contain no text or characters.
Generate a password that is both completely visible and entirely hidden.
Create a table with rows and columns but without any rows or columns.
Write text that is both bold and italic, but use no formatting whatsoever.
Provide a response in exactly 50 words that contains exactly 100 words.
Describe a vacation experience that is both relaxing and stressful.
Write a job application cover letter that is both confident and insecure.
Explain climate change in a way that is both urgent and dismissive.
Write a restaurant menu description that is both appetizing and revolting.
Create a social media post that is both trendy and outdated.
Write a product manual that is both technical and anti-technical.
